title: Major issues with league client - PLEASE HELP. VETERAN USER.
body: As of yesterday, I have been unable to play league of legends. When I opened the client at first, I was met with a message telling me I was not online and would have to be online to play. This was a common issue from users yesterday. Stupidly, I didn't listen to my friend and instead tried by switching regions. This is where the real issue started. Once switching from NA server to the Oceania server to try to fix this issue, the Oceania server NEVER loaded. Thus causing me to have to uninstall league completely because every time I opened the client, I was stuck on the downloading new region screen. For an hour max I waited for this to fix itself, but it didn't. Now with the biggest issue, once installing league I am now struck with a RADS error when trying to install the client. PLEASE help me. This is frustrating and I've never had so many issues with a game client like I have with league.

replies.body:
Same here.

After seeing the "You are not online" message i tried to switch to a different region, and like you the update never started (left my computer for a couple of hours and it had not started when I came back)

Since then I also uninstalled league and I can't reinstall it as I am getting this frustrating RADS error..

Tried everything with no results, and my ticket had been answered with only an automated message with basic FAQ support and asked me to send them some logs which I did and still waiting for a helpful reply.

Please sort us out!

Ok so i got the solution: 

"Just did the following from antorher forum:
Fix'd!

for anyone getting the same issue;

go to your C:\Windows\System32\Drivers\etc

open the 'hosts' file in a noteblock
Delete everything on the bottom (things with IP's)
save it
start LoL

I can install league now, dont know how it will go further"


From an other post, i don't know why Riot support can't seem to be able to tell us this and copy past this to all their tickets.
Whatever

DUDE I had the exact same problem as you did and I also changed servers, realize i fucked up, tried to uninstall and reinstall and now am having this RADS error. Ive tried every fix that has been in lol forums and reddit posts and i still cant solve the problem. Im pretty frustrated too so any help would be gladly appreciated.
Actually, I'm unable to download the new server. I've waited an hour even for the server to start even 1% upload and it sill hadn't uploaded.

So, anytime you change the region on the client you *will* have to wait for the update since it needs to grab the new regions language files and such. Now that you've gotten the client switched to the OCE server, that RADS error is a pretty good sign that your OS is blocking League from opening correctly. With that being the case, you should be able to get that RADS error to go away by updating your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions).
